title: [仅供娱乐]灌水五十九首（其二）翻译
author: 郁离子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 郁离子 于 2020-7-13 09:38 编辑 

书接上回:灌水五十九首（其一）翻译（下）

原文：
木板复凋零，无因版主明。
岂知千水贴，不敌一朝封。

翻译：
Pouring Water Fifty-nine Poems(The Second)

The glowing planks faded again because they didn't meet wise moderators.
Don't you know that thousands of watery posts can't withstand moderators' ban for one day.

replies.author: QWERTY770
replies.txt_content: 翻译的很好啊，比机器好多了

replies.author: crystalmole
replies.txt_content: 带诗人，英语带佬，膜拜膜拜

replies.txt_content:
